items.description: Gets the current date and time as a string.
Gets the current date as a string.
Converts a date string to a `datetime.date` object.
items.example:
from frappe.utils import getdate
my_date = getdate('2023-01-15') # datetime.date object

items.description: Formats a date/datetime object into a string.
items.example:
from frappe.utils import now_datetime, formatdate
formatted_date = formatdate(now_datetime(), 'dd-MM-yyyy') # '27-10-2023'

from frappe.utils import today, add_to_date
next_week = add_to_date(today(), days=7)
